com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.evaluator
Interface PlanetEvaluator

All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardPlanetEvaluator
public interface PlanetEvaluator

Interface for classes that evaluate planetary conditions

Version:
$Id: PlanetEvaluator.java,v 1.5 2006/07/06 06:58:36 martin Exp $

martin

Method Detail

evaluate

void evaluate(Planet planet)
Evaluate a planet and set the variables to the corresponding indications. After this call use the get methods to retrieve the result of the evaluation

Parameters:
planet - The planet to be evaluated

getAtmosphericGases

java.util.List<Gas> getAtmosphericGases()
Get a list of the gases that are present in the atmosphere of the planet

Returns:
A list of chem table data for each gas that is present in significant amounts in the planetary atmosphere.

getRetainedElements

java.util.List<ChemTable> getRetainedElements()

A list of retained elements
